problem_text_cn: 如图,已知△ABC内接于⊙O,BC是⊙O的直径,切点为A,若∠MAB=30°,要使MN与⊙O相切,则∠B的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that △ABC is inscribed in ⊙O, BC is the diameter of ⊙O, and the tangent point is A. If ∠MAB = N_0, if MN is to be tangent to ⊙O, then the degree of ∠B is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了弦切角定理与圆周角定理.此题难度不大,注意掌握数形结合思想的应用.
